A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I loved the movie. My 14 year old son ADORED it. He owns it.

I care more what my son and his generation thinks. They have taken ownership of this movie without decades of our baggage. My son at least\, has a future of new characters he's invested in.

I really don't give a damn what we old farts think\, save any reflection our stupid vanity to be expunged.
